headline: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE:LVS) Faces 13% Weekly Price Drop As CEO Transition Looms
summary: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE:LVS) saw its share price decline 13% over the past week amid significant leadership transitions, including the appointment of Muktesh Micky Pant to the board and impending changes in the CEO role. While these corporate dynamics unfolded, broader market turmoil from escalating global trade tensions exacerbated the decline. The Dow, S&P, and Nasdaq all experienced steep losses, with drops of 8%, 9%, and 10% respectively, as tariffs unsettled investor sentiment. The...
